audioText: Le pape confirme le célibat sacerdotal. Comment le pape Léon XIV entend relever le défi de la crise des vocations chez les jeunes catholiques
question: What challenge is Pope Leo XIV addressing?
options: The challenge of modernizing Catholic liturgy
The crisis of religious vocations among young Catholics
The problem of declining church attendance
The issue of financial difficulties in parishes
explanation: The Pope is addressing 'le défi de la crise des vocations chez les jeunes catholiques' - the challenge of the vocations crisis among young Catholics. This refers to fewer young people choosing religious life as priests, nuns, etc.
